column4: has anyone used the command apt-get install dnsmasq? When I try I get the error E: Couldn't find package dnsmasq... I'm trying to setup a shared internet connection between 2 ubuntu boxes
how can can I share my internet connection between 2 ubuntu boxes?
could check out that 'ip masquerading howto' - but there maybe some easier config tools for it - mentioned on the ubuntu wiki.
